Text: Thanks so much for this but on my end at least, the audio dubbing/sync seems to be off. Also the quality is around 360p. In the future, try and get it as close to HD as possible!
I want to thank you so much for putting these up. Last season I had such a hard time finding the AD's. Keep up the great work!!!

Thanks for the up.

to NeoJoe090..The sync problem is from BB production not Showtime. Rumor has it half their staff went to Glass House and now their control room is an unprofessional mess.  Also they haven't up-graded their cameras to HD
